summary: This basic mod plays the death sound from Super Mario Sunshine \"Too Bad\" When you die.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Are you ready?
Are you prepared to die with This fun mod?
Then this is just for you![/b]

[youtube]G-wFxjCbK5A[/youtube]

Tested before for the Perfect Time!

Featured on: 
[youtube]C6Yu_iSMmw0[/youtube]

[u]Installation[/u]:
Extract the *.7z folder and move into your Skyrim/Data directory file
overwrite if asked wether you want to.

[u]Deinstallation[/u]:
Delete the mod files from your skyrim/data folder that you find in the *.7z archive downloaded for this mod.

[u]Known issues[/u]:[list]
[*]Please note if you don\'t hear it please increase your music settings in Skyrim  
[/list]
[u]Credits[/u]:[list]
[*]Inspired by xchargerfanx: For the Original Mario Death Sound Mod:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5794]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5794[/url]
[*]Audacity
[*]Freemake Video Downloader
[*]Freestudio
[*]Sound Sample From Youtube:[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJbMruYpsQQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJbMruYpsQQ[/url]  
[/list]
author: Emini
